actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to authorize the payment of interest on reserve balances.

summary.text: Interest on Reserves Act - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to authorize the payment of interest on the required reserve balances of member banks held by Federal Reserve Banks. Sets forth a formula for determining the maximum amount of such interest to be paid in any one year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to authorize the payment of interest on reserve balances.
